dialogue.introduction: I'm Furutaka. I'll be happy to show how all the good points of heavy cruisers.
dialogue.library_intro: Heavy cruiser, Furutaka. Selected by Vice Admiral Mikawa to be a member of the 8th fleet, I took out a lot of enemies at the 1st Battle of Solomon! This is what a heavy cruiser can do!
dialogue.secretary1: This is a really great unit, you know?
dialogue.secretary2: The next operation area's data, is it okay to show me?
dialogue.secretaryidle: The admiral's, busy... uh... what to do...? I wonder what's Kako doing?... Admiral, what should Furutaka do!?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral! How was the Heavy Cruiser team's performance? Did we make a difference? Awright, that's great! I'm so happy!
dialogue.show_players_score: Look's like there's a notice for you, Admiral.
dialogue.equipment1: With Team Mikawa's comrades, I can boast.
dialogue.equipment2: With this night battles will be a cinch!
dialogue.supply: Night battle will be easy with this.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: My weapons need some repairs, yeah?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: That last battle, I overdid it a bit, yeah?
dialogue.docking_complete: Seems like repairs have been completed.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been constructed.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Seize the enemy transport ships. Want to defeat them, right?
dialogue.night_battle: I'm pretty good at night battles, you know!
dialogue.mvp: We only stood out by chance. That's what being a heavy cruiser is about.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Ah, they got me... I'm not sunk yet!
dialogue.end_of_year_2014: The end of the year has come. Admiral, leave room cleaning to me!
dialogue.new_year_2015: Admiral! Happy New Year! I'll do my best to show you all the good things about heavy cruisers this year as well!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Today is a wonderful day, Admiral! Furutaka is honored to be with you! Thanks as always!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: This year's summer has come along, hasn't it? I wonder where I should buy a new swimsuit with Kako.
dialogue.fall_2015: During this season the naval base calms a bit down, doesn't it? Autumn makes Furutaka feel a little strange.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, Merry Christmas! To be spending this season together with you, I feel so happy!
